creator.description:
Fighting propaganda, misinformation and disinformation. 
Independent Labeling Service. 
Automated labeling: Work in progress. 
Manual moderation: Volunteers wanted.

locales.description: Long service as NAFO fella, fighting disinformation and helping Ukraine.
locales.name: NAFO elderly

locales.description: Username, description or postings clear indicators of support for the MAGA movement. This includes MAGA, MAHA, TRUMP or TRUMP2024 in description. Posts with #MAGA or #TRUMP2024 hashtags.
locales.name: MAGA

locales.description: The user has proven to be a scammer. The label requires more evidence than just a report. Link to post or thread with in-depth material is preferred.
locales.name: Fundraising scammer

locales.description: The post, or user, has a clear pro-Kremlin profile.
locales.name: Pro-Kremlin

locales.description: The post link, or the user regularly posts links to sources known to be disinformation networks.
locales.name: Disinformation network
